channel.title: Release-notes on Plus-F
channel.description: Recent content in Release-notes on Plus-F

item.title: Version 1.5
item.description: Initial (incomplete) support for 48k and AY sound.

item.title: Version 1.4.1
item.description: Fix to TZX loading which allows Speedlock 2-7 to work.

item.title: Version 1.4
item.description: Support for loading TAP and TZX files inside ZIP files. Integration with World Of Spectrum archive.

item.title: Version 1.3
item.description: Compatibility fixes for Raspberry Pi. Support logging to file.

item.title: Version 1.2
item.description: Added full-screen mode and rendering tweaks. Minor bugfix to tape loading.

item.title: Version 1.1
item.description: Single launcher for Emulator and Guest UI tweaks Windows 64-bit Installer and Universal Zip downloads

item.title: Version 1.0
item.description: Performance improvements UI tweaks Revamped network connectivity

item.title: Version 0.6
item.description: Implemented TAP and TZX support Added support for +2 Fixed some processor emulation bugs (there are still others in there)

item.title: Version 0.5
item.description: Initial public release Emulation is still rather buggy (I will add fixes, but for the moment consider it the equivalent of a wobbly RAM pack or tape loading errors!) Reset doesn’t always work properly Some snapshots fail to load if the Emulator has been running for some time
